package.name: Activo_Nopobox
package.summary: Easily prevent buyers from using a PO Box for shipping and/or billing addresses at checkout with customizable error messages.
package.description:
The No P.O. Box Address Magento extension allows store owners to easily prevent Magento from accepting P.O. Boxes for Billing and/or Shipping addresses at the checkout process. It has separate switches for Shipping and Billing addresses.
You can also customize the error message that will be shown to the users when they try to use the P.O. Box in their address.
Unlike other similar tools, this extension uses Magento's own validation mechanism for increased compatibility and reliability; and therefore should not cause any issues at the checkout process. It also does not alter the looks of the checkout page in any way.
package.notes: Now compatible with the popular OneStepCheckout extension which modifies the checkout to all be handled in one step/page.
